official_title: An Act to amend section 142 of title 13, United States Code, to change the date for taking censuses of agriculture, irrigation, and drainage, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service with amendment, H. Rept. 94-821) Directs the Secretary of Commerce to take a census of agriculture in 1979, in 1983, and in every fifth year beginning after 1983. Requires, in conjunction with such census, that in 1979, 1988, and every tenth year beginning after 1988, the Secretary shall take a census of irrigation and drainage. Requires the statistical classification of farms in effect on January 1, 1975, with respect to such censuses, to be effective through June 30, 1976, and any statistical report issued on or before June 30, 1976, with respect to any such census, to reflect such classification, permitting additional classifications as deemed appropriate by the Secretary.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 142 of title 13, United States Code, entitled "Census".
An Act to amend section 142 of title 13, United States Code, to change the date for taking censuses of agriculture, irrigation, and drainage, and for other purposes.
